title: @Riot someone's not doing their job
body: So I've noticed that Kalista still doesn't appear on the champion page of the website, is this intentional (for whatever reason) or is someone just being slack?

replies.body: They still havent updated the EUW tribunal. Instead of them putting like 404 - page not found ( since no tribunal exists currently) it shows the league website in its old format and colors, and still has the tribunal up lel
I just gave a another example to back up ur statement?
But I don't care about EUW, I only care about Kalista. She's being ignored. Inb4 Kalista new Quinn...
